event.title: I Love Free Software Day - in Lodz

body.p: On the 16th of February we celebrate the I Love Free Software Day! Lets get together and celebrate the "I Love Free Software Day".

ul.li: üóìÔ∏è Event details are here and on their dedicated webpage.

The I Love Free Software Day 2026 Lodz event is open for everybody and we are happy to welcome all Free Software enthusiasts. There will be 3 planned presentations / workshops (OpenSCAD for 3D printing, OpenStreetMap releated free software and freestyle presentation of favorite free software tools for creative works and informal networking with pizza and drinks.

body.p: Everybody is welcome to join the celebration in our Lodz Hackerspace!
